document_data.name: Hledh Hellspawn
document_data.parents: [[Kurgoth Hellspawn]]{{Cite adventurers league/The Occupation of Szith Morcane|5}}
document_data.mainbody: Queen '''Hledh Hellspawn''' was a [[fiend]]ish [[fire giant]] who ruled the city of [[Maerimydra]] in the [[Deep Wastes]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/It's All in the Blood|31}}
document_data.Description: She was an enormous [[demon]]ic fire giantess with six fingers on each hand.{{Cite adventurers league/The Occupation of Szith Morcane|5}}
document_data.Personality: Fearsome and commanding, Hledh was considered a capable enough leader to have numerous demons serving her.{{Cite adventurers league/The Occupation of Szith Morcane|18}}
document_data.Abilities: Powerful and huge even for a fire giant, Hledh's demonic heritage granted her even greater powers that she could pass on to others of her kind. She could conjure a globe of ''[[darkness]]'' and was immune to all [[poison]]s.{{Cite adventurers league/It's All in the Blood|33}}
document_data.Relationships: Hledh was descended, via the [[half-fiend]] fire giant [[Kurgoth Hellspawn]], from [[Graz'zt]] the Dark Prince. She considered the [[demon lord]] to be her master and readily carried out his wishes.{{Cite adventurers league/It's All in the Blood|34}}
document_data.History:
At some prior to [[1372 DR]], Kurgoth Hellspawn sired Hledh  Eventually, she supplanted Kurgoth as the leader of the demons and fire giants of Maerimydra.

By [[1479 DR]], Hledh was considered the Queen of the Burning City and had rebuilt much of the former [[drow]] settlement to suit its giant-sized inhabitants.

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Hledh led a group of fire giants in an attack on [[Szith Morcane]] and left one of her lieutenants, [[Fydor]], to manage the occupation.

Later, Hledh was at the [[Undying Temple]] assisting Graz'zt and the [[vrock]] wizard [[Squallocks]] in the ritual to help Graz'zt resist the [[Vizeran DeVir]]'s [[spell]] to send the demon lords back to the [[Abyss]].{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|46}}
